name: Shooting Clash: Animal World
description:
If love hunting games, Shooting Clash: Animal World is one of the best hunting games for you. Hone your hunting skills with different sniper rifles and assault weapons, upgrade them, earn trophies and become the most acclaimed hunter in the hunting world you always wanted to be. Earn rewards and train yourself for this wild animal shototer sniper hunter.

Smooth controls in this shooting game will put the pleasure in the clash of your animal hunt for free. Earn rewards and unlock locations to hunt in the forest, jungles, mountains, and cold deserts.

* 1vs1 Multiplayer Mode
* Diverse locations and seasons
* Player progression and scoring
* Weapon and skill upgrades
* Difficulty levels to cater to all gamers
* Realistic animations and feel
